channel.title: World of Zemi!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/newbanner.png[/img]
To lazy to post anything else if you want more information on the server tell me what to put in this thread or if it needs more Picture's/Media. Thank you for reading this post comment if you like. Comment if you don't like I don't care at the moment.
[size=14pt][u][b]Details:[/b][/u][/size] [size=10pt]I started this server back when I first started to learn about MoparScape it is very helpful sometimes... I've got this as a Blank Clean Delta server and just started adding as much as I could I redid all the Item ID's so the model's read a little cleaner because the Item ID's aren't clashing together and so I got some Gnome cloth's back and it seems that it made the server run a bit smoother. I would love to hear people's thoughts, comments and constructive criticism on this. If you have anymore ideas on how to make it less like Delta then please comment.[/size]
[size=14pt][u][b]Minigames:[/b][/u][/size] [size=10pt]Barrows (Only npc's trying to make it as real as RuneScape's.) Assault (Not the same old delta Assault I tried to make my own warriors guild and it looks pretty good.) Fight Pit's (Same old fight pits but I'm adding some interface texts with them so it's more like RuneScape's.) Pest Control (Same old PC from any other Delta but I made the check a starter of a quest.) Castle Wars (Need's a lot of work it's really glitchy but it's just a basic model that I want to build from and try to make better.) Clan Wars (I had some help making this it still has some glitches that need to be fixed but other then that its amazing!) God Wars (Same Delta God Wars I added 3 God's all there animations are perfect and attacks are just right. :P) Bio-Pets (I made up this minigame I used some god war's mini bosses.) Fun-Pk (Great for people who don't know how to pk and I'm making a FunPk in the skilling area.)[/size]
[size=14pt][u][b]Features:[/b][/u][/size] [size=10pt]100% Webclient Made by: Michael Geant 75% 474 Looking weapons and specails (Still need to find GFX's and Animations for PVP weapons.) 474 Running models (Changes when you wear Whip/Claws/Dragon.) God mode (You just float in the air and it reminded me of 12-sky2 so I added it for donater's it also works while fighting.) 100% Show Equipment Screen 100% Item Kept on Death Screen Change all Model ID's so Model's read a little cleaner I've finished redoing all the Item.cfg Id's so now the models are much cleaner and all the item's are usable. All skills are trainable but I need to improve skilling. 100% GFX/Animations for Barrelchest/Bandos God/Armadyl God/Zammy God.(I know that not there proper name's but who give's a shit...) Really sick home area I've never seen it on any other server. [color=red]More features will be posted as we update the server.[/size]
[size=14pt][u][b]What I want to work on:[/b][/u][/size] [size=10pt]Fixing how you skill and making them more like RuneScape's Making a better Clan Chat system Making a Clan Chat Interface Skillcape Emote with 474 models Making more bosses with right GFX's and Animations Fixing up Castle Wars might change it into Battle Grounds[/size]
[size=14pt][u][b]Development Team:[/b][/u][/size] [size=10pt]Owner/Coder:Mikey Co-Owner's:Aaron & Mudderz 2nd Coder: Open 3rd Coder: Open Hoster: Open[/size]
[IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/picbanner2.png[/img]

item.title: World of Zemi!
item.dc:creator: @razami razami
item.description:
@razami wrote:

Thank you. haha I’m trying my hardest on this server but I’m trying to study for my G.E.D… and I got fired from my job now I need to find a new one so I have no time for this server anymore I’ll retry some other time I should just close this thread down it was a bunch of trouble anyways… Delta is so messy and so hard to clean up… I have no time for it.

item.title: World of Zemi!
item.dc:creator: @razami razami
item.description:
@razami wrote:

Yeah that’s the word. Thank you for spelling that out for me. That the reading disease I got from my parents. So that’s why my English isn’t so… proper… But anyway’s I still need Programmer’s help with my server development I can barely find anytime to fix up my server anymore…

I have to take care of my Grandmother, She is on her last hour’s with cancer so can you guy’s please lighten up on me a little please?

Thank’s for posting on this thread I’m thinking of just releasing this because I have no time to code it…

Read full topic

Well thank’s for that. I just didn’t do to well in school with English and I have some reading disease that starts with dic and end’s in select. Haha so that’s why my word’s are sometimes mixed up or hard to read out.

I learned that if you do space’s why your trying to make a point that people don’t bitch to much about it so I’m good with the post so far.

How do you guys like my new layout on the thread post?

item.title: World of Zemi!
item.dc:creator: @Fuse Fuse
item.description:
@Fuse wrote:

[quote=“razami, post:85, topic:385420”]This was a DeltaX clean server that I started with. I used some TUT’s from here to create what is now World Of Zemi. When I ran it I got like 30+ Player’s then the server went down because my hoster flaked on me. So I’m waiting for my paycheck and it to get my bill’s taking care of and then when I have enough money I’ll but a VPS service and start the server again. I still want to clean it up and little more. So if you know any TUT’s to get some bugg’s that delta has so I can fix them that would be great.

Thanks for the helpful post I hope I cleaned up the post enough for people to read.
If I didn’t please post more way’s I can make it cleaner.[/quote]
If English is not your first language then don’t worry about it too much.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Fuse Fuse
item.description:
@Fuse wrote:

razami:

I must give a little of what?

You take: i.e help, help, help.
You give: i.e give the community something useful (great knowledge/information, a good tool or application, a completely new, fresh and original server).

item.title: World of Zemi!
item.dc:creator: @Fuse Fuse
item.description:
@Fuse wrote:

[quote=“razami, post:80, topic:385420”]Thanks for all the advise that are I really wanted. I just put the flamer part because I was hoping some people would understand that I really am trying my hardest to learn about Java. The people who have posted helpful comment’s I thank you for the help and I will take your advise and keep messing around with Java so I can learn more. I will take out the part of the title so that it won’t be flamer bait. I’m sorry that some of you can’t understand what I post I’m just trying to post the way I seen other people to post. I’m trying my best to use proper English and if I am typing things wrong please tell me what more to fix but try to post about the server now because I have posted some picture’s… So look at them read my post and try to tell me what to fix on it. Tell me how to get better knowledge on learning Java. All I ask for is a little help.

Thank you for the useful post.
I’m sorry for over reacting on the flamer’s post and I’ll try to use your post to help learn on what to change I guess because every post is helpful I guess but I do want a mod to look over this post to see if anyone was flaming for dumb reasons or whatever…

I hope I typed this post a little bit more clearer if I didn’t sorry for that and tell me how I should post.[/quote]
Although you may still be judged by your previous posts, it’s nice to see someone apologise like that. Remember to take a little, you must give a little.

Read full topic

item.title: World of Zemi!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“razami, post:74, topic:385420”]Haha new flamer’s I’m so happy… You guy’s or whatever you are go fuck off because as I said I am a new coder and I’m only here to learn and if here to just flame or cyber bully… Then please just leave I don’t know much about Java but now I learned there is a difference with JavaC+ and JavaC++. I want to see what you fucker’s created… Seriously all this bull shit and I don’t see how it’s a normal 317 server… Just because I haven’t added picture’s yet… Anyways this was a blank 317 server that didn’t have anything on it. I’ve added all those updates that I posted… I might not be the best but the RSPS community is not moving in development at all everyone is just taking PI server’s and moving some NPC’s around and rename shit and BAM! They have a server… I’m try to make something unique… So again I apologize if you love to flame or if it gets you off or whatever just please like my mom said and someone made fun of which was pretty obvious that it is really stupid but thats probably because your mommy didn’t raise you right or something.

Thanks to anyone that posted helpful comments.
For those who flamed this is my childish “Cyber Flipoff”->…,!,.-.-.,!,…(Remember what I said before you want to flame again I’m a beginner coder and you can call me dumb all you want or you can help me and tell me how to make my server better…)[/quote]

This is a serious post, and if u think I’m flaming, then just leave now.

  1. Don’t say cyber here. People won’t like you.
  2. Asking for people not to flame you is the NUMBER ONE way to get flamed
  3. Learn your languages, you seem even dumber when you say JavaC+. C, C# and C++ are all languages that are often used in association with Java, but are not Java, nor do the companies have any sort of affiliation
  4. Please use commas, periods, breaks ect. It makes it so much easier to read, currently your words are way to jumbled together.
  5. Mess around with Java more before you post here, and I recommend if you actually are interested in Java, you should also try some tutorials in other places, as I don’t recommend Moparscape for these kinds of things… generally the learning part.
  6. The report to moderator button is helpful, just press it on posts you don’t like and let a moderator evaluate it to see if that users post should be removed along with some form of warning. I use it all the time.
  7. Don’t be so sarcastic all the time

If you follow this stuff, people won’t troll your work as hard.
Goodluck with whatever your doing, and please change the title of the thread, prefereably taking out the first part. You can do so by double clicking on the topic box that you’ve created on the thread page.

Read full topic

Good luck.

item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“razami, post:74, topic:385420”]Haha new flamer’s I’m so happy… You guy’s or whatever you are go fuck off because as I said I am a new coder and I’m only here to learn and if here to just flame or cyber bully… Then please just leave I don’t know much about Java but now I learned there is a difference with JavaC+ and JavaC++. I want to see what you fucker’s created… Seriously all this bull shit and I don’t see how it’s a normal 317 server… Just because I haven’t added picture’s yet… Anyways this was a blank 317 server that didn’t have anything on it. I’ve added all those updates that I posted… I might not be the best but the RSPS community is not moving in development at all everyone is just taking PI server’s and moving some NPC’s around and rename shit and BAM! They have a server… I’m try to make something unique… So again I apologize if you love to flame or if it gets you off or whatever just please like my mom said and someone made fun of which was pretty obvious that it is really stupid but thats probably because your mommy didn’t raise you right or something.

Thanks to anyone that posted helpful comments.
For those who flamed this is my childish “Cyber Flipoff”->…,!,.-.-.,!,…(Remember what I said before you want to flame again I’m a beginner coder and you can call me dumb all you want or you can help me and tell me how to make my server better…)[/quote]
Ok, before you ever post again, realize this.

Java, C, and C++ Are all different languages; also, RSPS is programmed in Java, therefore you don’t need to know C or C++.

C+ also Isn’t a language.

Read full topic
